alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Northern Humboldt Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 3:06AM PST until February 14 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Showers producing accumulating small hail expected. * WHERE...Coastal Del Norte and Northern Humboldt Coast Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Small hail accumulating on area roadways along the coast will create hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Northern Humboldt Coast
